body: why do you deserve to be feminized if you have a tiny cock?
I still can't get over the artist's obsession with giving the futa characters weird boxy testicles with thick veins. Every single time. His older work from years ago looks so much better.

Yeah, he keeps pumping these out cuz they sell. I do wish he would get more creative about plot and character design since it's all been futa schoolgirls/prostitutes, cosplaying traps, or both. Futa on male is a pretty small segment to begin with so it's not that surprising that good artists typically go generic with it in order to get some kind of profit. That said, I still enjoy his art.

Although being somewhat repetitive, I like the consistency of AAL's doujins. The characters look great, the dialogue is hot (though nothing to write home about) and the plot points are something that I don't see myself getting tired of any time soon, especially because it's hard to find some good feminization/emasculation doujins in this vast sea of trash and untranslated works.
Stare at boobs to much until not realize the dick XD
god bless whoevers been translating these bangers recently
The artist keep making the same shit that I'm not even bother to read the texts. There's better crossdressing femdom doujins out there but not translated, suck that I couldn't pay a translator.
in page 16 says he'll continue to draw the same type of content so basically expect the next few doujins to be the same lmao

Anyone else getting bored of the literal same feminizing, emasculating, futadom, copy and paste plot? Was good the first 3 times. Now it's all this dude comes up with. I remember he actually did futa on girl at one point. Now it's just the same shit mixed a different type of way. 2/10.
Dude was very blind, but at least he got more for what he paid for.
This artist has been making the same doujin for years now
